QuestData.Title: Powering the Waygate - The Makers' Perch
QuestData.Description: It is time then. Let us activate the waygate.$B$BYou will find the first switch inside the Makers' Perch in the western edge of the basin.$B$BBeware, $n. The titans used the perch to watch over their creations. Many of their stone servants still guard the place.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Avatar of Freya at the Rainspeaker Rapids wants you to go to the Makers' Perch and use the Activation Switch Gamma.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're back, little one. I was beginning to worry about your well-being.
QuestData.RewardText: We're halfway there, $n. One more switch needs to be activated before we can retrieve the Etymidian.
